name: Orville ALLEN, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, et al, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Allen v. Pennsylvania Department of Corrections

parties: Orville ALLEN, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, et al, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 3rd day of December, 2003, probable jurisdiction is noted and the order appealed is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
840 A.2d 991
Orville ALLEN, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, et al, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 3, 2003.
